title: nevocoin
author: nevocoin
created_time: September 17, 2023, 07:45:07 AMLast edit: October 29, 2023, 11:10:07 AM by nevocoin
content: Nevocointhe open-source decentralized peer-to-peer untraceable digital currencyWebsite: https://nevocoin.org/Source code: https://github.com/nevocoin/nevocoin/Discord: https://discord.com/invite/hgk4chyUgkMatrix: https://matrix.to/#/#nevocoin:matrix.orgBlock Explorer: https://explorer.nevocoin.org/Twitter: https://twitter.com/nevocoinForum: https://forum.nevocoin.org/FeaturesBlazing fastIt's no longer necessary to wait hours for your transactions to confirm. Nevocoin is immune to Replace-By-Fee: transactions with no confirmations are less likely to be cancelled by an attacker. And in case you want extra security, one confirmation takes just 2 minutes.CPU miningNevocoin employs a custom mining algorithm based on random code execution to ensure a fair hashrate distribution. Consumer computers' CPUs are the best hardware for mining NEVO.PrivateMost cryptocurrencies are transparent: anybody in the world can track your funds and possibly correlate them with your private life. Nevocoin is completely anonymous and untraceable by default, thanks to its multi-layered privacy features.ScalableThanks to its fast to verify mining algorithm, pruning, Bulletproofs+, and many other optimization techniques, Nevocoin is one of the most scalable blockchains while still providing an excellent degree of anonymity.Useful linksExchangesXeggex: https://xeggex.com/asset/NEVONonKYC: https://nonkyc.io/asset/NEVOPoolshttps://nevo.kilopool.com/https://www.nevocoin.ch/Mining softwareNEVORig: https://github.com/nevocoin/nevorigKilonevo: https://github.com/kilopool/kilonevo

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: Isn't this coin just another Monero counterfeit?What does it offer that XMR doesn't?XMR is ASIC resistantXMR is anonymous XMR is fast tooXMR has a long-standing reputation and is therefore highly trusted by its users for security and privacy issues.

comments.author: shell32
comments.body: Quote from: nevocoin on September 17, 2023, 07:45:07 AMDiscord: https://nevocoin.org/discord.htmlThe author deletes objectionable messages in discord. An obvious sign of scam. This is how the new shitcoin tries to keep potential victims from objective information.

comments.author: tevador
comments.body: FYI, it has a premine of 1 million coins out of 18 million. https://github.com/nevocoin/nevocoin/blob/483dde839b37aa45bc78d9adab8b8b039017b78e/src/cryptonote_config.h#L188Otherwise, it just seems to be a low-effort fork of Monero with zero innovations.

comments.author: zygzag
comments.body: big black spot forced to mine on the wallet...no implementation for hiveos...unless you have all these CPUs on Windows with so many wallets open...it remains incomprehensible not to have thought of this kind of thing at launching a randomx forkanother thing thrown at me quickly

comments.author: 13y85t
comments.body: Quote from: tevador on September 17, 2023, 01:01:52 PMFYI, it has a premine of 1 million coins out of 18 million. https://github.com/nevocoin/nevocoin/blob/483dde839b37aa45bc78d9adab8b8b039017b78e/src/cryptonote_config.h#L188Otherwise, it just seems to be a low-effort fork of Monero with zero innovations.haha you're right, even the wallet is still named "monero wallet" and ask for XMR donation

comments.author: Cynce
comments.body: Quote from: zygzag on September 17, 2023, 04:32:19 PMbig black spot forced to mine on the wallet...no implementation for hiveos...unless you have all these CPUs on Windows with so many wallets open...it remains incomprehensible not to have thought of this kind of thing at launching a randomx forkanother thing thrown at me quicklyTotally agree on all of it... this was released way too early.I will say though... I'm mining on five of my hive rig at the command line through ssh and using hive to monitor temps. All mining to the original wallet address. Not idea... no pools... just saying, there are options.

comments.author: Lafu
comments.body: The Github Account is only 3 days old and it also can be an attempt from Hackers with all the downloads from there.I dont say that the files or the wallet are inffected but for me it looks like a bit strange.It also looks like this is just a copy and paste coin without any real meaning.
